message: I'll take 90% and leave you with 10% - a fair starting point, wouldn't you say?
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I think I deserve more for being the one to make the next offer!
I'm willing to give you more, but I'm still holding out for a better deal.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.
I'm getting closer to what I want, but I think I can do better. Let's see what you're willing to give me!
I'm getting tired of this back and forth. Let's meet in the middle - I'll take 70% and you can have the remaining 30%.
I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a compromise. I'll meet you halfway and offer a 50/50 split. It's time to make a deal!
